name: Faerie Dragons

Neutral.Abilities: :activation: The selected unit suffers 2 :damage:. This is a [:spellpower:](../spells/index.md) that does not count towards your [spell](../spells/index.md) limit.

notes: The 2 :damage: can be dealt to any unit on the Combat board.

The ability counting as a [:spellpower:](../spells/index.md) is only relevant when the Fearie Dragons are in the player's unit deck (e.g. after being recruited by [Diplomacy](../abilities/diplomacy.md)).
